channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
I'm a noob so i need your help ^^!
When i log in it says No response from server pls help i made i youtube video to show you: [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/h3r34y0utub3?feature=mhee]http://www.youtube.com/user/h3r34y0utub3?feature=mhee[/url]
FAQ: Q:U NOOB?
A: YEES!

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Show us what is printed onto the CMD (black box) when you try to connect, the server must be getting the connection but stopping it in someway. Usual causes of this can include the IP/Character you’re using to login being blacklisted, or the client and server not being compatible.

Post exactly what’s printed on the client/server box.

Marine5287:

Try changing the 0.0.0.0 to 127.0.0.1

That probably wouldn’t be an issue if the server recieved the connection request and was able to reject it in some manner.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Try changing the 0.0.0.0 to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
